beer.beer_description:
ROYALLY. GOOD. BEER. 
The King is here. And he likes milkshakes. A big and bold and powerful Double Milkshake IPA packed with mango and passionfruit, this is a brilliantly balanced sweet and citrusy beer tit for monarchs, Coming in at 8.4%, this is one to sip and savour so you don't get off with your nead. Available now and it's your Divine Right to give it a try.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 50 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 11!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 10 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 20 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 5!

When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 5 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 2!
Unlike The Highlander from TV, there are more than just one brewery in Scotland fighting the great craft beer war. Join the battle. No kilt required. Try 5 more for Level 2.

items.badge_description: Load up those hops, watch the IBU grow and drink it down! Now you’re all hopped up. The more bitter, the better. That's 145 different beers with an IBU of 65 or higher. Try 5 more for Level 30!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 25 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 6!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 60 check-ins with a photo.

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 375 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 76! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 380 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 77! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
